alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:39PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF DELAWARE AND SOUTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 439 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Marysville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Delaware, Marysville, Powell, Sunbury, Ashley, New California, Radnor, Milford Center, Shawnee Hills, Galena, Ostrander, Magnetic Springs, Alum Creek State Park, Delaware State Park, Olive Green, US Route 33 at US Route 42, Warrensburg, Kilbourne and Columbus Zoo. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 126 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central and west central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
